starwars.swinterfaces

Class SWGridTextInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • starwars.swinterfaces.SWGridTextInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GridRenderer

    public class SWGridTextInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements GridRenderer
    This is the text based user interface for the simulation. Is responsible for outputting a text based map and messages on the console and obtaining user selection of commands from the console

    Its operations are controlled by the SWGridController.

    Author:
    Asel

      • SWGridTextInterface

        public SWGridTextInterface(SWGrid grid)
        Constructor for the SWGridTextInterface. Will set showBanner flag to true to show the text banner with the first map render.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • showBanner

        public static void showBanner()
        Display the simulation banner. This method will only be called once for each instance. Based on code from the original Eiffel version of this program, and originally generated by the UNIX program figlet.

      • getSelection

        public ActionInterface getSelection(java.util.ArrayList<ActionInterface> cmds)
        Description copied from interface: GridRenderer
        Method that presents the user the list of commands (cmds) in a suitable form (either text or graphical) and returns the command selected by the user.

        This method will always display to the user all commands in cmds. This method should never be called with a null or an empty list of commands (cmds) in order to avoid an infinite wait.

        Specified by:
        getSelection in interface GridRenderer
        Parameters:
        cmds - list of commands from which a single selection must be made and returned
        Returns:
        a chosen command from the list of commands (cmds)
